column4: It seems that the usb disk created from unetbootin is corrupt, as usual.......... This time the installation worked, except it gave the system incorrect UIDs, which fixing is quite easy. Can someone link me to the bugtracker?
please take the time to read information given to you, it answers your question
if you prefer, you can go to http://bugs.ubuntu.com and click on "Report a bug" which will send you to the link ruan gave you.  And keep in mind we're all volunteers trying to help one another
I recommend you also to learn to read English.  The bugtracker is located over at
